data.name: Answer Me
data.detailed_description:
Answer Me is a game where you can ask anything and answer with tactics to win.

Single Player

We prepare many hard-to-answer questions for you. Pick your answer and see how players around the globe react to the same question.

Multiplayer - Majority Mode

Ask anything here. Pick your answer wisely. You stay if your answer is the majority. Try to become the last player standing.

Multiplayer - Minority Mode

You stay if your answer is the minority. Try to predict what others will do and surprise them!
data.about_the_game:
Answer Me is a game where you can ask anything and answer with tactics to win.

Single Player

We prepare many hard-to-answer questions for you. Pick your answer and see how players around the globe react to the same question.

Multiplayer - Majority Mode

Ask anything here. Pick your answer wisely. You stay if your answer is the majority. Try to become the last player standing.

Multiplayer - Minority Mode

You stay if your answer is the minority. Try to predict what others will do and surprise them!
data.short_description: Ask any questions and answer them. The majority(minority) answers stay. Try to become the last player standing.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
